segments.text: I need help figuring out how to use this phone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . First you pick up the receiver and hit one of the first 3 buttons . Do you hear a tone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Now you dial 9 on the keypad . Do you hear the tone change ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , when you hear it change , that means you have an outside line . Where are you trying to call ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am trying to call home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Well , to dial to the outside you just now dial the number . For a call inside the company just hit the extension number . Do you know the extensions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have a list of extensions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , if you ever need help with an extension , you can dial O .
segments.speaker: S2
